characteristics.name: Openness to Change
characteristics.description: Consistently shows enthusiasm and adaptability in their content, representing a willingness to learn and evolve.

options.description: Agents with this trait are action-oriented and assertive.
Agents with this trait are more open-minded and accommodating.

characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Consistently uses positive and supportive language, demonstrating a strong ability to build connections.

options.description: Agents with this trait are clear and straightforward in their communication.
Agents with this trait are compassionate and understanding.

characteristics.name: Humor
characteristics.description: Consistently uses humor to lighten the mood and build rapport, indicating a lighthearted nature.

options.description: Agents with this trait are quick-witted and often use sarcasm.
Agents with this trait are clever and can come up with humorous responses rapidly.

characteristics.name: Proactivity
characteristics.description: Consistently takes initiative and seeks out opportunities, demonstrating a strong sense of drive.

options.description: Agents with this trait are highly motivated and push boundaries.
Agents with this trait are driven by a desire to achieve their goals.

characteristics.name: Authenticity
characteristics.description: Consistently presents themselves in a genuine and transparent manner, building trust with others.

options.description: Agents with this trait are truthful and sincere.
Agents with this trait are open about their emotions and experiences.

characteristics.name: Empathy
characteristics.description: Consistently demonstrates an understanding of others' perspectives, showing compassion and kindness.

options.description: Agents with this trait are caring and considerate.
Agents with this trait are easily moved by the emotions of others.

characteristics.name: Resilience
characteristics.description: Consistently shows an ability to bounce back from setbacks, demonstrating a strong sense of grit.

options.description: Agents with this trait are determined and persistent.
Agents with this trait often expect negative outcomes.

characteristics.name: Curiosity
characteristics.description: Consistently demonstrates a desire to learn and explore new ideas, showing an inquisitive nature.

options.description: Agents with this trait are always seeking knowledge.
Agents with this trait often lack interest in learning.
